Infinite Extremes✚ ━ 
【副本說明】
Rewards for first time breaking through specific Floor are as follows:
“Extreme of Dark” - “Yummy Alpacas” x 1 set
“Extreme of Fire” - New outfit for “Maya the Calendar Creator”
“Extreme of Water” - “Black Key” x50
“Extreme of Earth” - “Madhead” x1
“Extreme of Light” - “Harpy” x1 + New title “Attribute Conqueror” + Diamond x1

*Each rewards will be given ONCE only
